111.title: Young women passion's

1111.content:
Cindy was on the verge of the road, waiting for the bus to arrive.

This was her first day in a Non-Human school and wasn’t really sure what to expect.

She was the daughter of a powerful cabalist and a blood mage, by inheritance only she had to be a witch, at the very least. Some powers she already had recognized as her owns. She was able to levitate, although not for long periods of time, she could also move objects with her mind and was now trying to master the spells which would grant her the ability to induce someone else to do as she asked.

Still, she was no master in any of these spells, so she couldn’t trust on them not to fail if an emergency occurred. That was why her parents had given her a familiar, which she always left at home
.
Yes, she knew perfectly that a slime demon was something of the most hard to kill and perfectly capable of protecting its owner, but…having a slime on your shoulder wasn’t just what she wanted to do at her previous school.

Maybe, she thought, here it will be cool to have one?

So she waited, and waited. And waited. Until, suddenly, she felt a little tap on her shoulder and, turning around to inquire, she smiled in happiness seeing who had interrupted her.

In front of her there were in fact three girls that she knew already, the three of them were her oldest friends, which she had lost when she and her parents had moved to another city.

The first two are twins, even if nobody else could see it.

Kaihera, a Wood Elf, and Faihera, a Dark Elf.

Kaihera is a young elf full of vitality, her lithe body always ogled when walking around, especially for the two large orbs of flesh she’s sporting on her torso. She actually wears skin tight clothes to even enhance her overgrown bust, reveling in the sensation of being ogled at. She has the body, and the brain, of a real bimbo, even though, thanks to her sister, she had really began to become smarter and smarter as of late.

Faihera instead has a dark complexion, as all of her true species, and an even darker mood. Completely opposite of her sister she has a muscled body structure, with almost no feminine traces except for little A cups on her chest and her dark purple long hair. More rigidly controlled than her bubble-head sister, she is more often than not the one who places herself in danger to help her “Big Sister”.

The third one was the one with which Cindy had always best related to. Her name is Namyria, a green skinned plant woman, with a body perfectly balanced with an almost unnatural hourglass figure. She’s a dryad, which always bring with herself a little potted plant for reasons of her own. Always timid and silent, she relate very well with Cindy for their love of nature and its beauty.

“Girls? You’re coming too, to the new school?”

“Cindy!” Kaihera shouted while jumping in place, causing several boys around to fall on the floor due to blood loss from their noses.

“It’s, like, so much time I don’t see you, Girl!”

“Well, Duh! She wasn’t in this country, Kai. How could she come here?”

“Oh...You see, Cindy? Fai is also happy to see you…She spoke a full sentence!”

The dark elf snarled toward he sister, before acknowledging Cindy with a nod.

The four girls stayed there talking and remembering, while unaware of the troubles that were going to befall on them.

The school bus was arriving but, if someone had taken any attention, they would have felt some kind of disturbance coming from it. But all the students were blissfully engrossed in joking, talking or greeting with their fellows so not one of them realized the danger.

As soon as the bus stopped, its doors opened and the driver, a red skinned, clawed and fanged, fella looked at them with a strange glint in its eyes.

“All Aboard, People! School’s awaiting ya! Wouldn’t want to arrive late?”
1111.title: Group

choices: One of the girls in particular
All of them as a group
11111.content:
What seemed strange to some, but they didn’t spoke in fear of being ridiculed, was that each student had to identify himself by saying his name and his nature.

Most of the students simply thought that the management wanted to know who could make an issue and who couldn’t, so nobody thought of making any issue of it. Nobody seems to notice as the driver took note of everything, placing here and there some strange marks as each name and identification was given to him.

As soon as everyone was on the bus, the driver smiled to himself, chuckling softly, thinking to his cargo and their final destination, then he started the engine and slowly moved the bus on the road toward one of the portals that would bring them for, at least, a semester away from home, toward the institute that would have taught them.

A few minutes later, after the bus in which the Cindy and her friends were in has passed the dimensional gateway, the True School Bus arrived at the bus stop but realizing there wasn’t anyone there, it quickly drove off.

Cindy was seated near her three friends, all of them talking and discussing of the incoming semester at the New School.

“So, anyone knows where it is or what’s its name?”

“Yeah” said Kaihera “I don’t know either but…They told me that is on the Moon!”

“Kai? Please, don’t believe to whatever someone say to you. It’s degrading for us elves. We’re not all pretty bimbos, like you are.”

“Girls?” Said Namirya softly, always too timid to raise her voice to more than a barely audible whisper “I heard from my plant that this isn’t where…”

“Who’re you, like, calling a Bimbo…err…Bimbo? ”

“Kai…You know I love you. But don’t try to outsmart anyone. You simply can’t.”

In the midst of the discussion and the pathetic warnings from the Dryad the bus stopped and all the students had to leave and admire their new home.

The college-like building was huge, almost fantasy like, resembling a castle with turrets and ramparts. Suddenly a voice took them all out of their own reveries, revealing herself in a smallish woman, red skinned and dressed in a tight short suit that left nothing to the imagination.

“Ehm. Greetings to you all and Welcome to our institute.

For the following months you all will reside here at the Demonatrium High School for the Talented Non Humans. I’m Miss DMentia but, you may call me simply Mentia.

Now, to process everything with the correct procedure, my assistants will divide you all in small groups, and lead you to your rooms, giving you also a brief tour of the Institute. You’ll have this weekend to relax and prepare yourselves for your first lesson day, on Monday.

In each and every floors there will be a Floor Representative, a Senior, who’s going to guide you around the institute, giving you advice and directions. Now, Boys and Girls, once again, welcome to DHSST, Demonatrium High School for the Special Talented.”

Soon, as the assistants moved through the crowd of students, Cindy found herself alone with five other, confused, students as the assistants led them inside the building, while her friends were quickly divided as well .


[Do you want to follow someone in particular? Or maybe the entire group?]

1111111.title: Bimbo Kaihera Adventures

11111111.content:
Kaihera was having so much fun, a new place, new possible friends, plus everyone seemed to be so kind.

Soon enough she was led by her assistant to her room, but he then told her to go immediately to another room, where her Floor Representative was. She obeyed of course, and went and knocked on the door.

A short wait later, she was greeted by a buxom red skinned woman, dressed with a complete chef attire.

“Hello dear, you’re one of the new students eh?”

“Yes, Ma’am”

“Oh oh oh…No need to call me Ma’am. I’m DVour. You may call me simply Vour, all right Sweetie?”

“Yes Ma…Vour.”

The woman moved closer to Kaihera, looking at her with a clinical eye.

“Oh my, Poor dear. You’re so skinny..”

“I..I am?”

“Surely you can see it for yourself. Oh no, that just won’t do. After all, you surely know that They recommend at the very least six full meals per day. ”

“They do? Really? I didn’t know that.”

The woman curiously looked at the girl in front of her, realizing that it wasn’t only appearances in her to look like a bimbo. She truly was a bubble-headed bimbo.

“Sure.” She continued “Why, how many meals you ate at home?”

“Three per day”

“Oh no! You must be severely undernourished. No, I will take you under my wing, dear. Don’t worry, I’ll prepare you a diet that you must follow. You’ll see how healthy you’ll become.

Now, come inside and have some cake, let’s put some health on your body.”

Kaihera knew that there was something strange but, the woman was so kind and gentle, that her words had to be true. In that moment she remembered her sister words, about the fact that she hadn’t to believe to anyone since she was a bimbo and so, too stupid to understand a lie.

She grimaced for a second turning then her expression in a grin.

‘She thinks I’m too stupid eh? I’ll show her, who’s the stupidest…’

Quickly she followed Vour inside her room, seating at her table as the woman gave her a huge quarter of a thick chocolate coated cake.

“Here child, start with this. When you finish just whistle to me and I’ll bring you more, while I finish to prepare a more… substantial meal”

Kaihera licked her lips as she looked at the quarter cake in front of her. She had rarely the chance to eat something as sweet and tasty as that treat for her mom always had special care in what her daughters could and could not eat.

To tell the truth, she felt a little naughty, but after a forkful of cake, she felt herself brought to a different plane of existence.
The taste was divine, the consistence perfect.

She quickly put her jaws to work and, almost literally, gobbled the cake up. As soon as she had finished her mouth was covered in crumbs and smeared in chocolate, while her dress was feeling just a bit too tight.

She had barely burped away that Vour was quickly at her side.

“Oh, you poor little thing, you surely had to be hungry. Since you liked it so much, why don’t you take the rest as well? I think it will take some time still to finish preparing, so you can eat on, dear.”
11111111.title: Weighty Bimbo

111111111.content:
In front of the elf the towering three quarters worth of cake appeared and, even though she felt full after the first quarter, only looking at it let her stomach growl in hunger.

Kai couldn’t stop herself and, with a smile plastered on her face, she began digging in the cake, taking huge mouthful of it, eager to savor again the delicious taste of the sweet.

Lost in the decadent taste of the cake, Kai failed to notice how her belly was faring.

This one was slowly but surely growing in a muffin top over her tight miniskirt and below her huge knockers. Still, the girl didn’t care about the feeling of her clothes until she had completely cleared the treat. Only then, she unconsciously opened her skirt button, letting her growing belly to flop onward.

Once again, Vour seemed to appear from thin air, moving closer to the girl.

“Come Child, first, I’ll show you the uniform, then you can have your first real meal.”

Kai hadn’t the force to counter the request, slowly and helped by the woman, she moved toward a dresser and rapidly changed her clothes. She had to admit that, as strange as it was, it was good to get out of those skin tight clothes and into more comfortable ones.
She only looked worried when Vour gave her a small bikini thong and nothing else.

“Oh, dear, that, of course, is not your uniform. But I thought would be better to wear it while you have your meal, so that you can be comfortable. Later on you can put on the real uniform, what do you say? ”

Kai hadn’t thought about it in that way but, she had to admit that it was a good idea.

Quickly she was wearing the small bikini top, her breast, not compressed from her clothes, were completely covering the visual of her belly, which was slowly, but surely, growing fuller and more bloated as time went on.

Vour didn’t wait a second to usher her to the kitchen table.

“Here, child. Now, let’s start your diet for an healthy body. Ready?”
111111111.title: So good, so much…bring me more

choices: It was a good appetizer, let’s move to the Main course
1111111111.content:
Kai felt suddenly hungry, she couldn’t know that it was a spell used by the demoness in front of her, but she quickly compelled to it and nodded with alacrity.

“Very well. Here, let’s start with these appetizers.”

Vour left in front of the girl a dozen plates, each one full to the brim of fried onions, friend tomato, fried bacon strip, and so on and so forth. The elven girl couldn’t delay any longer and, while the woman kept bringing her more, she simply dived in that ocean of delicious food, cleaning plate after plate, letting her gut grow larger and larger, rounder and rounder and soon, softer and softer.

Vour looked at the elven bimbo with a satisfied look in her eyes, the hunger spell she had casted on the food was doing its part and, for good measure, she also casted the flash food-to-fat conversion spell into the youngling, so to let the new arrival start growing nicely and not feel out of the group. This girl, however, was something else as she stared at her consumption.

This girl was really enjoying her meal, without realizing yet how big she was becoming. Already her ass-flesh was beginning to overlap her chair, while her belly drooped down a little on her legs and her arms began to faintly jiggle with the extra flesh in them.

Yes, she was something else and Vour couldn’t wait to see her reaching her maximum potential.

Kai was having the time of her life, she was enjoying all kinds of junk foods she had only dreamed of, knowing that it was making her healthier and healthier. She grabbed a huge five decker hamburger, easily the size of a round plate and , slowly, she managed to pull it to herself as she began to take huge bite out of it. She couldn’t believe how hungry she was, she would have never realized it if not for that gentle woman of Vour.

As she gulped down another bite of the ginormous hamburger, pulling closer to her a chocolate cake next to it, she promised herself to thank the kind woman as soon as her meal was done.

DVour, Demoness Vour, kept refilling the table where the now rotund elf was still eating away at her hearth content. The demoness was pleased in seeing such a devotion to gluttony, still was almost sorry that it was only the very first day and couldn’t interact with this new, wonderful, succulent young elf. Almost sorry since she knew that, with an appetite like hers, she would grow to be a much richer morsel if she gave her the time. DVour, lost herself in these thoughts, didn’t notice immediately that the room was suddenly eerily silent.

She turned around and cooed in awe at the young elf, seeing her struggling to reach for the last piece of cake still on the table, which was closed off to her by her own engorged body. The small elven girl was definitely rotund now, her whole body puffed up by both the hunger spell and her own freed gluttony.

“Did you enjoy you meal, my dear? Or you want some more?”
1111111111.title: A roly poly rotund Elf

choices: She bullyt Kaihera for being too skinny
11111111111.content:
Kai nodded once in silence, while her body throbbed slightly at her every moment.

“Are you all right? Why aren’t you speaking, dear? Have you swallowed your own tongue?”

“I…” Kai opened her mouth only a little to answer but, that proved to be fatal, as a window shattering, earth cracking belch escaped from her body, covering everything in the room with the stench of semi digested food.

“S..Sorry…”

Vour had to launch silently a spell, to protect her nose from that stench, but she simply smiled at the girl, while patting appreciatively on her arm, happily noticing a first thin layer of jiggling fat on it .

“Nothing, dear. It’s just a compliment to me. It means you enjoyed your meal completely, so I should thank you.

Now, I think it’s right time to put on your uniform and then you may want to go to your room for a lie down. Don’t worry about dinner, I’ll bring it to you as I do for all of my little piglets here on my floor.”


Kaihera, helped by the demoness, wore the now ill-fitting clothes, without noticing that her belly drooped down on her legs, slightly covering her intimacy, while her shirt failed to cover her oozing flesh and her, now beach ball sized, breasts. The elven girl, thanked profusely the woman and slowly waddled away noticing only now how big and healthy were the other boys and girls on her floor.

She stopped after ten or so meters to catch her breath, feeling herself tired.

“Uff, sure is tiring to be healthy…”

“D-Don’t…remind…me…”

Kai turned over and remained speechless, as she watched a huge girl slowly lumbering beside her. She was a huge mass of flesh, which oozed out of her uniform no matter how many buttons were closed or how tight it could be.

The elephantine girl turned to Kaihera, her four chins wobbling as she slurred slowly, between gasps.
11111111111.title: Closing the meal

choices: Let Kai go meet her roomate
Kai decided to spy on the Healthy Nymph and her special meal
111111111111.content:
“You...must…be…new..here..”

“Yeah. I’ve arrived…today. I’m Kaihera…Wood Elf…”

“Name’s…Jennifer…I’m…a…Nymph.
I’ve…been…here…since…three…months…already. Not… always…on…this…floor…though.
I…was…some…where…else, before. Can’t…remember…well…precisely…where.
Then..they…moved…me…on..this…floor…two…weeks..ago.”

“So you’ve grown so…healthy, in only…two weeks?”

“Yes…Miss…Vour…is…very...gentle...with...me. She...promised…me...a…special…trip…next…week. Can’t…wait…” the girl said with an awestruck smile on her wobbly face.

Kai smiled back and tried to hug the huge girl, managing only to reach a flabby portion of belly fat.

“I’m so happy for you…I wish I could come with you!”

At that moment the voice of Vour appeared behind the mountain sized girl, grabbing with both hands one of the huge rolls of belly fat of the girl.

“Sorry, Sweetheart, but this trip has to be taken personally and individually. Isn’t it right, poppet?”

“Yes…Miss…Vour…”

“Good. Now, Jen, why don’t you bring your cute healthy body to my room? It’s time for your special meal…”

“Right…Away…Miss…Vour…wouldn’t…dream…of…missing…it…”

Vour and Kaihera turned to watch the jiggling mountain of a Nymph as, in all of her flabbiness glory, she slowly waddled away, then the demoness turned on the fattened bimbo in front of her.

“Now, go to your room, Dear. You mustn’t over tire yourself. Look at Jennifer there. She once was an anorexic cheerleader, and thought to be better than everyone else…now is only my little stuffed piglet.
Go, now, your roommate must be waiting you. ”
111111111111.title: Making friends

1111111111111.content:
“My room! I completely forgot…Thank you Miss Vour”

“Everything for each of you little piglets, see you later. I’ll bring dinner to the two of you in a little bit.”

Kaihera watched the sinuous forms of Vour move away helping the jiggling mass of Jennifer to pass through the double doorway of her apartments, and felt so happy for the new healthier friend. Still, she turned around and began what she felt like a long trek toward her room, all of those thirty meters tiring her more and more. Not even for a second she thought that before her arrival in the school she would have been able to run there in an instant.

Finally she managed to reach her room and went inside to meet her roommate, which was busy sitting on the bed while eating what appeared as a sort of goop out of a huge bowl.

“Hi! I’m Kaihera, your new…roommate.”

The girl stopped, swallowing the mouthful, and turned her head toward the rotund wood elf, while putting down the bowl.

“Hey there…I’m Jessie, pleasure to meet’ya. So, first time here?”

“How can you tell?”

“Easy peasy, babe…your clothes still fits you. Kinda.
So, you’ve just arrived…and are already as big as a wrecking ball.

Hmph! Another fat slobber of a pig.

Wonderful.”

Kai looked around and didn’t understand. “Fat? I’m not fat…I’m Healthy! Miss Vour said…”

“That bitch. Oh God, am I the only sane around here? Can’t you see what she’s doing? You’re fattening up like a stuffed turkey! Sheesh, learn some self-control, as I do.”

Jessie turned around and, slowly, rose from the bed revealing her almost freakishly huge hourglass figure to Kaihera, while bringing the strange bowl half full of some strange blueish goop with her. As the red headed Jessie paraded her figure closer and closer to the chubby elf, the latter couldn't fail to notice that her roommate body seemed tight packed, as if it was nothing more than a water balloon ready to explode.

“Not an inch of saggy, flabby fat on me. No sir. My wonderful body is just as it was when I came here, still fit and trim.”

As Kai watched the seemingly southern girl parading around the room with her overinflated body, she couldn't fail to notice that for every time jessie moved, something inside her seemed to be sloshing around.

“And I’ve got this to give my thanks to” She proffered the bowl full of blueish goop “I made a pact with one of the kitchen guys, he gave me this goop, that will satisfy my hunger without making me fat, and in exchange he only wanted to come in here daily to watch me. Ha! The fool.

He can watch as much as he wants, he’s not going to have any of this.”

Suddenly someone knocked on the door and the girl wobbled over Kai, moving closer to the door.

“It’s open…come inside.”
1111111111111.title: Of rooms and roomates

11111111111111.content:
At the door frame appeared a real hunk of a man. He was a male demon, hugely built, rippling muscles on a body made to be ogled at.

“Hey Jessie, I’ve come for our Agreement and...Well, hello there, you must be one of the new…students.”

“Yes, I’m Kai. Pleasure to meet you.”

“Yeah…you can count on it. I’m Feat. DFeat.”

Presentations done the demon turned on the goop filled girl, watching her intently.

“Now, Jessie, I’ve got good and bad news for you. Which you want first.”

“Shoot the good one.”

“All right. I’ve got a batch of goop here, that is much more effective at its job, and it comes with the little perk that it’s much more easier to swallow.”

Jessie beamed at this, even though her body seemed already filled to the brim and ready to explode..

“And now the bad one. I can give it to you, but only when I’m here.”

“What!? Why?”

“Cause I’ve got to…uh… use some 'personal equipment' to give it to you. If you want it you’ve got to do what I tell you.”

“H-Hey! You…You’ve got to give it to me….You got me addicted to it….You swore you would have given me all of it…”

"And I will, you just have to go on your knees...just like that. Good, Jessie, now move closer to me..."

Kaihera watched in silent disgust as the other girl kneeled down in front of the kitchen Senior, while her hand moved to lower his pants zipper to…!
11111111111111.title: Meet the Kitchen Staff Senior

choices: An old rivalry (Warning Graphic Content ahead)
111111111111111.content:
Kai blushed deeply red as she realized that her roommate Jessie was going to…to…

Unable to stand there and watch, she waddled out of the room, as fast as she could, closing the door behind her, while she huffed and puffed from the exertion.

Lifting her eyes, she was surprised in seeing Vour in front of her, a long line of trolleys behind her.

“Kai, sweetie? What’s wrong?”

“Oh Miss Vour. It was horrible…She believed to be healthy…but was, like, anorexic!”

“Did Jessie torment you? I knew I should have eaten her head off.”

“But then…a man came…”

“A..Man? Here? On my floor?!”

The stare of Vour began to change, growing red hot with fury.

“And...and he gave her this…goop that made her seem healthy but it isn't true. And now...now, they’re…he has ordered her to…with his…”

As the elf kept talking the Demoness was growing angrier and angrier. as per the words of the piglet in front of her, that foolish girl of Jessie had done something that she, DVour, wouldn't have thought possible. Still, and that was what left her more enraged than ever before, someone had decided to invade her dominion, stealing one of her own growing morsels!

This was unacceptable!

Her fiery vermillion eyes seemed to burn so brightly that she could have starte a fire with nly her stare but, rapidly she composed herself. She had to calm the, still too small, Elf before she could enter in action.

The demoness, then, hugged the rotund elf, shushing her, and calming her with a slow lullaby and with some silent enchantments..

“Don’t you worry, Kai. I’ll take care of it. You wait here.”
111111111111111.title: Run away

1111111111111111.content:
As the demoness entered the room, the door behind her sealed on itself, as per the demoness wishes so that nobody could come and disturb her Revenge. At the same time DVour moved forward toward the other demon.

“DFeat. What are you doing here?”

“Dvour. We have made a pact with this…young one”

As he said so, his hand stroked the bulging cheek of Jessie, which was completely occupied drinking the deliciously goop right out of the Demon, her lips splattered of the strange blueish goop.

“She didn’t want to be fat. So we granted her the request.” he added with a chuckle.

“This is my domain…You scoundrel.”

“She came to us. You should take better care of yours, if you wish to partake…”

“Enough! You do a pact with one of mine, without telling me anything. You come HERE by Yourself and you even dare to mock me? In my Reign? I will punish the two of you for such an act!”

DFeat smiled in pleasure as the human girl kept drinking his goop like gift.
“I would like to see you try…Ohhh, yes…Good job Jessie…keep going...you don't want to get fat as the other pigs around here, do you?.”

Jessie didn't even hear those words, she was now in a different world, one where only the goop was important. She didn't even notice the changes happening to her, as her body was filling out rapidly, turning her previusly flared hourglass form in a more equalized spherical form.

Even when her clothes began to literally rip off her body, as they couldn't contain it anymore, still she kept gulping down eagerly from the demon itself. Her body, finally freed of the clothes restriction began to swell even faster, turning her rapidly in a Always swelling sphere as her skin began to lose her natural color assuming a purple tone as more and more of that goop passed through her lips

Even when her hands and feet were now nothing more than little stubs, unable to reach the floor she took any notice. She truly had become addicted to that goop, and to its so deliciously sweet taste as her body expanded becoming more and more like a perfect sphere.
1111111111111111.title: Enemies of old

11111111111111111.content:
“You wish to see it, DFeat? Alright then, hope you enjoy your last moments. You’ll now see why I’ve been given my own floor.” With a demonic glance DVour turned toward Jessie, locking her eyes in the girl’s own.

“You’re never been this hungry, girl. You feel the pang in the pit of your stomach. Ease it, girl. Follow your instinct.”

As the demoness spoke, Jessie’s sucking began to be more erratic, as if something was disturbing her, until her eyes became frenzied in desperation. The girl shot a glance to DFeat watching him hungrily.

“What are you looking at, girl? Keep on sucking if you want to avoid the fate of this bitch.”

Jessie resumed her job but something, soon, became apparent as DFeat began to feel tugged toward the human balloon-like girl, as if she was pulling him. Distraught by the enjoyment he felt in the unexpected rough treatment, his eyes wandered around the room, but when he looked down again he shrieked with fear realizing that he was now being inhumanly swallowed whole by the hungry inflated girl as she kept on swallowing more and more of his demonic form.

“Stop! Stop, you Fool! Dvour! Help! Help me!”

The demoness jumped and landed on the smooth surface of Jessie’s body, sitting there cross legged watching calmly as the scene evolved.

“Help you? Why should I? You’re the Demon around here, aren’t you? I’m only a fool, an old fool as you told me long time ago. Well, this old fool still has aces in her sleeves.”

Jessie had never felt this kind of hunger before so she continued to swallow the tasty morsel between her lips. Even when DFeat was dragged along , and his body began to disappear behind her lips she never stopped, until the entire demon was completely swallowed. Only then, she felt the hunger cease and managed to get back to her consciousness.

“Wh…What…just..happened..?”

Vour moved and went toward the face of the bloated purplish girl, looking at her firmly in the eyes.

“You tried to cheat me of my rewards. You wanted to be an anorexic stuck-up bitch, you didn’t want to be Healthy. So you made a pact with a senior from the kitchen staff.”

“D-DFeat?”

“Yes. Only, now he is inside you. He’ll keep on giving you all of your favorite goop, and you won’t have the possibility to stop.”

“W-What!?”

“Yes, dear. Trouble is he was changing you in something else, something he could use in his kitchen. Now, as he’s inside of you, you’ll continue your transformation into a gigantic blueberry, growing and growing until you reach total fullness, until you’ll be ready to pop.

And you Will pop.”

Jessie began to cry as she felt her body beginning to stretch larger and larger, as she felt herself being filled by her beloved staple, the goop of DFeat.

“You can feel it, can’t you? Your body throbbing from all the liquid, your skin tightening as you grow bigger, your tendons stretching to contain you, while at the same time you can feel them all failing you.”

Jessie began to cry harder as she felt her body grow to greater heights, feeling her skin tightening, knowing that there couldn’t be much more space that her body could find to grow.

“This can only end in one way, Jessie. You pop.”

“No…no…please…”

“Well…There could be another way…”

“A-Anything…Please….”

“I’ll remove every memory of this accident from you while, at the same time, I’ll condition your body to be the perfect piglet, you’ll maybe manage to resist me and defy me for some time, but you’ll fall. And you’ll grow fat.

Hugely so… Even more than Jennifer Nymph.

But you’ll be alive…so what do you say?

Fat….or dead?”
11111111111111111.title: Suffer the consequences

choices: Dig in! It was prepared for her by her new Diet coach afterall
Maybe She has eaten enough for today…
111111111111111111.content:
Kai was feeling an eerie sensation in the corridors, there was nothing out of the ordinary, apparently. She saw the shuffling of all the students of the floor, each in its own state of healthiness, from the almost anorexic, to huge masses of quivering healthy flesh.

Still, she couldn’t escape the feeling that something was different, as if the entire floor was enveloped in a web of changes, which had just now modified something. Suddenly the door behind her opened and she was pushed away, she barely had time to see a male-ish shadow disappear onto the next floor, when Vour and Jessie arrived to her, the latter one trailing behind the demoness with a defeated look in her eyes.

“And don’t come back, or I’ll report you to the Grand Master! Sorry, Kai, are you all right?”

Vour turned toward the elf and helped her to stand up again.

“I’m all right Miss Vour, who was that…?”

“A scoundrel who thought could do whatever he wanted. He’ll get what he deserve. Now, Jessie?”

The human girl was still ballooned, even if not in the same status as before, and looked sheepishly to her Floor Rep., even though she had no conscious memory of what had happened few minutes before.

“Y-Yes?”

“Don’t think that I will accept lightly the fact that, instead of growing Healthy, you preferred to meet with strange men on my floor.

Kai, I’m sorry to leave you so soon but Jessie here, needs to learn her lesson. I’ve brought you your dinner, remember to eat it all.

Jessie, come to my office.
NOW! ”

As the demoness and the balloon girl moved away, Kai found herself alone in the room, surrounded by the carts for both her and Jessie. She curiously picked one plate and her jaws began to salivate as she realized of what was composed her dinner.

Kai fell seated on her bed as her eyes could do no more than look around to the spread of food surrounding her, she licked her lips in anticipation, without being surprised at the amounts that were so completely different from what she was used at her home.

What will Kaihera do?
111111111111111111.title: Back to a Life of Healthy growing

choices: Following day, Monday! Let's go to class...
Following day, Sunday! What to do?
1111111111111111111.content:
Unable to wait any longer she grabbed the first bowl, which was full of melted cheese, which she scooped up with the special carved, deep fried sausages that rested in a similar bowl nearby.

As soon as the first bite was given, Kai moaned in pleasure, beginning to dig in the bowl much more quickly, feeling a strange, but so good, pang of hunger in her stomach.

When the bowls of molten cheese and sausages were cleared, she passed onto the next course, an entire portion supersized of burger lasagna.

Kai smiled happily, while munching that heavenly dish, wondering how could she have lived without it for all that time. As more food she shoveled in her mouth and throat, the more her belly grew onward, tightening her already tight uniform.

Soon enough, as she was only at one third of her meal, a loud ripping sound surrounded her, as her pants ripped letting her now bountiful and jiggling ass ooze out of the breach. Kai didn’t take any notice in this, engrossed as she was in attacking the first layer of a wonderfully built, sinfully delicious, richly calorie laden, two layers cake.

It was almost midnight when Kai managed to open her eyes, only then she realized she had fallen asleep just at the time when she had cleared every plate on every trolley, she yawned loudly as she began to scratch her huge, overstuffed gut, which had broken through every single button of her shirt.

She slowly pushed herself to stand, feeling strangely heavy and tired, and began to waddle around the bed with the only purpose to climb under the covers and sleep out that magnificent, health nurturing, first day of her new school.

As she began to fall asleep, she dreamily thought at how Healthy would she become if she kept following Miss Vour Diet. and soon, with that happy thought in mind, she fell asleep while dreaming of growing healtier and healtier for her Floor Rep.
1111111111111111111.title: Enjoy and Feast!

choices: Wait there and spy on them
Loudly enter in as if nothing had transpired
11111111111111111111.content:
Kaihera had spent the last day before the starting date for the lesson in almost total rest and relaxation mode. Sure, she had been taken by Miss Vour for a tour of the floor, where she and her classmates where going to spend the semester learning, studying and growing healthier.

Miss Vour herself had come to pick her up, driving her around with a strange golf cart, showing her the facilities and explaining her how the School was structured. In this explanation she finally understood why they were asked for their names and capabilities.

The School itself arranged each student to its own best study course, basing their estimation on their students information database. She felt a little sorry for her sister and her friends, since she couldn’t yet move freely in the school, but Miss Vour pointed to her that as soon as the first month of ‘probation’ was off, she could readily go and meet them.

That morning, instead she had to wake up early, at least for the school standard, for she had her first lesson at almost 09:30 AM, and considering the time to spend on breakfast she realized she could be late if she didn’t speed up. She rushed through her meal, eating as fast as she could, and was plaeasently surprised when she noticed that a fitting uniform had been left in her roomr by Miss Vour, with a little note on it.

'Good Morning Kaihera.
Just passed to give you your daily uniform, until your name isn't added to the laundry services of the floor. Also, don't worry about Jessie, she's following a special course under myself, so she will probably be already out and about by the time you wake up.

Lesson begins at 09:30 sharp.
Don't be late,

Miss DVour'

As soon as she had her new uniform on, noticing how a good fit it was, she moved as swiftly as she could, with her ever growing chubbier body, and managed to reach the classroom at 09:35, only to find it empty except for Miss Vour and Jennifer, which were inside talking in low, soft whispers.

This situation peaked her curiosity, for she wanted to hear what the two were saying, but she was at the same time late and if someone came along, then she would be spotted.

As she thought about it, she grabbed one of the fat, sprinkle covered, chocolate coated, cream filled donuts on a nearby stand, giving it a huge bite, while she pondered about it.

What does she do?
11111111111111111111.title: To the classrom!

choices: There is no one in the hallway?
111111111111111111111.content:
Kai quickly stuffed the rest of the donut in her mouth, while grabbing another couple almost unconsciously, and began moving slowly and as stealthily as she could toward the door of the classroom. Once there she placed one of her elven ears on the keyhole and began listening to the voices.

As she stayed there, listening, she seemed to understand that Miss Vour was complimenting the Nymph for her progress, while also giving her some suggestion and advices.

“Oh, Jen, I almost can’t recognize the old, anorexic, girl you once were. You’re growing so nice and healthy these days. Here, have some more of these donuts, aren’t they good?”

“Oommph…It’s…all…so…good…Miss…Vour.
I’m…really…happy…to…be…so…healthy…now. And…these…donuts…mmphm…are…sho…good.”

The ginormous Nymph was sitting down on a couch like chair, placed at the left of the teacher desk, where Miss DVour was sitting. the poor Nymph seemed to be steadily inflating, adding more and more layers of fat to her already overburdened body. Still, the poor girl seemed not to notice that she was already at the limit of her mobility, or to the fact that she was always wheezing and puffing being, constantly out of breath and so, she continued to gorge at her Teacher behest.

“Well, I like to see my pupils growing healthily, but do not let this go to your head. You can still grow healthier. Oh, by the way, you’re ready for today’s test, aren’t you?”

“Yes…Miss..Vour. If…I…can…ask…what…will…be…the..arguments…today?”

“Today we will study the frying technique and what can be cooked this way, and what not. Did you exercise yourself with it as I asked you?”

“Y-Yeah…I…did..as..you…said. By…adding…to…my...scheduled …diet…lots of...fried food...at any...given meals...”

“Good Job! Don’t worry now, your field trip is almost there as I promised you. Now, open up, let’s be a good growing girl, and clean up all of these remaining donuts. There are only three dozen’s left now.”

“As…good…as they…are…I…could…eat…hundreds…more…”

Kai herd Miss Vour saying something but, before she could understand what did she say, she felt a sound behind her and, scared of being found spying on her teacher, she turned around slowly to see who had caught her.

Who’s there? Friend or foe? Is even someone there?
111111111111111111111.title: Chubby Wood Elf Stealth mode

1111111111111111111111.content:
But who is there, that have found our rotund wood elf spying through the keyhole?
A teacher, ready to punish her or a classmate?
1111111111111111111111.title: She's been caught in the act!

choices: A little snack wouldn’t spoil any appetite, would it?
Need to maintain DVour scheduled Meals Plan
11111111111111111111111.content:
As Kai turned around she met the stern gaze of one of the red skinned teachers, looking down at her with a malicious glint in her eyes. The teacher was an hour glass figure with a pair of gold rimmed spectacles on her face. She remained silent as she stared down at the rotund elf, while inviting her to not make a sound and to follow her.

Kai, stunned by fear, didn’t utter a word and simply followed the teacher, until they reached an empty classroom, in which she was ushered. Only then the Teacher spoke, just when she closed the room.

“So, what do we have here? A snooping little piglet, yes?”

“I…I…”

“Shh. Do not speak yet. Did I told you that you could? No, I don’t think so.
Now, as a student, you’re supposed to go to your classroom and learn. Nowhere it says that you can go sneaking around snooping on other conversations.

I should give you a punishment, and in a normal situation I would do it, but seems to me that you’re new around here. Aren’t you?
Yes, you can answer now. ”

“I…I’m sorry. Yes, I…I’m new. I…”

“You don’t know what to say, do you? Well, a simple, I’m guilty, would suffice.”

Kai was trembling and blushing at the same time, her body fat slightly jiggling as she moved.

“I…I’m guilty, Ma’am.”

The teacher frown changed into a soothing smile, as her hand moved to caress the chubby cheek of the bountiful elf in front of her.

“Now, now…Wasn’t so difficult, wasn’t it? It is not nice to spy on others, so you must not do it. I can forgive you this one, since you’re here for the first time, but don’t do it again, all right, cutie?

Now, Miss Vour has often told me that a Healthy student, is a good student. So, seems to me you’re not healthy enough. For this reason, Miss…? ”

“Kai…Kaihera.”

“For this reason, Miss Kaihera, I’ll bring you now something to snack on. Then, as soon as you finish, we’ll go back to Miss Vour Classroom and this little incident will remain between us. Good enough? Good girl. Now sit there and enjoy.”

What could she do? Please this teacher and eat, or risk her ire but move on ?
11111111111111111111111.title: A scowling Teacher.

choices: …Turned around, letting out a loud scream
…Burped softly, while massaging her bloated belly.
111111111111111111111111.content:
Kai found herself seated in this school desk, which was unnaturally comfortable, when suddenly a huge and towering seven layers cake, covered in frosting and sprinkles, oozing caramel and white chocolate, was placed right under her nose. The poor elf stared at the huge treat with a little tendril of drool coming out of her lips as the Teacher moved closer to her and began whispering in her sensitive ears.

“Come on, it may taste delicious but it’s not going to bite you. Have some of it, have all of it. Eat your fill and be happy. Think how happy Miss Vour will be in seeing you so healthy. ”

With that final encouragement Kai couldn’t stop herself.

She moved her hands and began taking big chunks out of the cake with her bare hands, bringing morsel after morsel in her greedy mouth, all the while ignorant of how her body was faring. In fact, as per every morsel that traveled down her throat and into her stomach, her whole body seemed to grow larger, while her clothes, her uniform, grew tighter and tighter.

Her shirt, already at its limits, began to creak as more and more fat flesh formed beneath of it and the same was true for her skirt, which began to be uncomfortably tight. Kai seemed oblivious to these changes, as she was solely focused on the cake in front of her, which, without her notice, began to regenerate itself under her own eyes.

For every layer she managed to consume, another one seemed to grow right out of thin air, forcing her to try harder and harder to finish it, without never being able to even place a dent on it.

The teacher looked at the Elf with lust in her eyes. She was a student of Dvour, but the old hag was having way too many students anyhow and she didn’t want to have that old and decrepit Demoness to grow even more powerful.

She had wanted to grab that prized cow of a Nymph that the Demoness had nurtured and grown into a mass of quivering flesh, but Dvour never let her stare wander far from that one. Making that cow highly unreachable.

The stuffed pig under her eyes, instead…

Not only she was new, so easily replaceable, but was also at a good growth so she, DKay, had decided to grab her and lure her under her own. Yes, usually her students weren’t so big and…and juicy but, in order to strike back at her adversary, she was ready to do this sacrifice.

DKay moved silently behind the not so little elf and began unhinging her jaws, preparing to consume that rather large morsel in one, swift, movement.

As she began to lower her mouth on Kaihera, the elven girl suddenly stopped eating and….
111111111111111111111111.title: Just a light snack...

choices: DKay manage to consume the Elven Fattie
1111111111111111111111111.content:
As Kaihera realized that the cake in front of her was, somehow, regenerating each time she consumed one of the layers, she decided to give herself a pause.

She wasn’t feeling quite so hungry anymore and a needed rest was, she thought, in order to be able to renew later on her assault on that cake. As she let herself slouch on the chair she noticed something with the corner of her eyes, some kind of unnatural movement.

With her curiosity piqued she turned around only to find herself, face to face, with a huge, drooling and gaping, mouth that was there ready to engulf her in one bite.

Overcome by terror, she did the only thing she could think of.

She screamed.

Her loud and shrill scream seemed to pierce the walls around her, but the mouth of DKay stood frozen only for a moment, then it lunged forward, engulfing the head and part of the shoulders of the victim. Kaihera’s vision turned to deep pink walls, a tunnel of some sort, with humid and fetid air that blew on her face, making her choke as she tried to scream. The Elf tried valiantly to free herself from that prison, but in vain as DKay strong throat muscles kept on sucking her in, moving her closer and closer to the gaping hole that led directly to her stomach.

The demoness was moaning uncontrollably, the taste of that tender flesh was just too much, the elven girl was really a delicious morsel and the thought of DVour losing that prize was just as good. She tried to push her prey farther in, as swiftly as possible but, due to the girth of the same, and her deliciousness, she realized she just couldn’t.

Still, only the flailing legs of Kaihera remained outside of her mouth, and her body was already under the grip of gravity, being pulled by it toward her stomach, so DKay didn’t worry too much, until she suddenly felt that the prey had stopped descending.

Opening her eyes she looked around and began to tremble in fear as she saw the incandescent burning gaze of DVour on her.

“What do you think you’re doing…to one of MINE…students?”

What’s going to happen between the two lascivious Demonesses?

Will DVour manage to save her precious Elven butterball? Or Kaihera will become butterfat in DKay’s belly?
1111111111111111111111111.title: Salvation in the nick of time?

choices: Dvour grab the elf and try to save the salvageable from this experience
DVour stays and watch the Show
11111111111111111111111111.content:
Powerless to stop the other demoness, DKay tried to escape, with Kaihera still engulfed in her snakelike jaws, but all she managed to do was fall to the ground as DVour pushed her there.

“First, there was DFeat. Now you. I wonder if I should really trouble myself over this. The Grand Master surely will commend you about this foolish plans of yours to disrupts what we’re doing here. After all, it’s not my plan you’re sabotaging…but Her’s.”

DVour moved closer to the other demoness face, whispering to her that if she didn’t released immediately her student, she may be enjoying her last meal…only to be eaten by a much bigger fish than her.

The other demoness blanched in realizing that the threat here was very much likely afterall, it wasn't a mistery to every Demon in the school that their Master's was a glutton for stuffed lesser demons.




Kaihera was choking and losing consciousness, she began feeling as if she was being pulled out from that throa…NO! She couldn’t think of it in that way! It was a tunnel! It had to be a tunnel! She couldn’t be devoured at her age…Only to think of it was truly terrifying.
Luckily for her, also due to her quite fattened form, the ack of oxygen made her fall unconscious a few seconds later.



As soon as the, quite fat, elf was freed, DVour turned her anger toward the other demoness, staring at her with such hatred that the other one couldn’t avoid to tremble and whimper.

“Silence, You fool! Do you understand what the Grand Master want to do with these…Students? Naturally some of them can be used and preyed upon. But there are so many others that are to be reserved to Her, and only by HER decision can be used, as she require of course.

I saw you trying to ensnare the lovely Sarah Nymph from my grasp…As you just now tried to do with this luscious Elf…But what you fail to realize is that these two are prime possibilities to meet her Requirements.

And what do you do? You try to capture one and almost eat the other!?

DKay, you deserve the punishment that is coming for you.”

The other demoness, after locking her jaw into place, turned with a stare full of fear, toward her enemy.

“P-Punishment? What are you talking about?”

Demoness Vour smiled nastily as she turned, leaving the passage toward the doorframe of the classroom free of any obstacle.

“You really didn’t know that these two, as all the other prime possibilitieshave been already promised to Her?

I guess not. But try to guess this. Who do you think is going to appear from behind that door?”

As DKay tried to flee, turning around and opening a window, the door to the class opened and a tendril of a smoky dark substance entered the room, moving with marvelous speed until it coiled around the fleeing demoness ankle, forcing her to crash on the floor and pulling her toward the darkness outside of the room.

It was at that point that a demonic voice, a sound so alien that it made feel pain to those who heard it, appeared in the room, coming from the solid darkness outside the room.

“DKay. You dare to try to consume what is rightfully mine?

I shall consume you then and give your reign to someone less foolish.

You, Dvour.

You have been quite the faithful servant. You’ll receive, by the end of the day, all of the students assigned to the late DKay. Use them well and remember …Do Not Fail ME.

There is nothing greater than I…Remember it well. ”
11111111111111111111111111.title: Bringing Big Guns into the fray…

111111111111111111111111111.content:
Dvour, not wanting to cause any disturbance in Her Master meal, hurried toward the unconscious form of Kaihera and lifted her from the floor. The demoness launched a last quick glance to the form of her once adversary, unable to feel as joyful as she should be while seeing the young demoness being consumed messily by the Demon Master.

Feeling suddenly fearful she realized that the unholy creature was looking at her, trying to decide if she was also part of its meal.

As soon as that thought entered her mind, DVour fled from that room, carrying along the fattened up elf with her, until she reached the rest of her class in her own classroom.

Fortunately, the appearance of her Master had forced a stasis spell to be enacted, locking every souled being in the institute to freeze, stopping their time and their minds. Swiftly she pushed Kaihera into one of the desks, and began the tedious work of re-arranging her memories, as to make her think as if she had a long and cruel nightmare.

Dvour then moved to her own desk and seated, concentrating to appear as calm as she should have been, if the owner of her life hadn’t showed up.

Suddenly, she felt the shift of time, as the souled beings in front of her began to breathe and feel the shift of time once again. The buxom demoness, a book in one of her hands and the other near the board with a piece of chalk, twirled around and, feigning surprise, looked at the slumped form of the Elf, still unconscious from her original ordeal.

The classroom had fallen silent, seeing their Teacher and Floor Representative, move down the desks, until she stopped near that foolish girl who dared to fall asleep in class.

‘If only they knew what she has endured…’ thought Vour with a mental sigh.

“Kaihera? Are you…Sleeping in my Class!?”

Suddenly Kai woke up with a scream and, under the confused stare of her classmates, began to cry as if in pain. A couple of behemoth like anthro’s tried to edge closer to calm down the hysterical girl, but the demoness was there first.

“Kai? Kai! What’s the matter? Are…Are you alright?”

The elven girl slowly managed to stop her sobbing as she realized she truly was in her class, and not in…not in the throath… Tears began forming in her eyes again, until Vour embraced her, calming her and then turning toward the class.

“Alright. Class for today is suspended. Please, return to your rooms. We will continue in the afternoon.

Jen? Don’t go yet, please.”

As the students, slowly lumbered and waddled away, in the classroom remained only the Demoness, the hugely obese Nymph, and Kaihera.

Vour turned once again toward the trembling elf, and began soothing her, while trying to ask her, as gently and politely as possible, what happened.

“I..I don’t know, Miss Vour. I had this…this really vivid dream…a nightmare…As if something was…was…as if something…was eating me. S…S-swallowing me…whole…
It…it seemed so…real…”

“Relax, Kai, you’re here and you’re all right. See, There is only us here, me and Jennifer. It was only a bad dream. Jen, please, could you help Kai to a mid-morning break? The best way to forget a nightmare is always something tasty in your stomach.

Kai? Follow Jen, and don’t worry. It was only a dream…Now move along, the two of you…”

As Kaihera rose from her desk to follow the hugely mass of blubber that once had been a Nymph, the Demoness turned her eyes on one of the windows as if assorted in thought.

Who do you wish to follow?
111111111111111111111111111.title: Back to Kaihera, the Elven Fattie

choices: Maybe a belly rub while she’s eating?
1111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kai walked through the hall alongside of the mountainous Nymph, they walked in silence, toward their floor mess hall in order to comply with the advice from their Floor Representative, and Teacher. Kai was still thinking to her nightmare, unable to let go at how real it had seemed.

Jennifer, seeing her friend still shocked, stopped for a moment, turning slowly to face her.

“Kai? Are…you…alright?”

“Y-Yeah…Just having some trouble…figuring out why it came…to me, you know? I never dreamed things…like this one, before.”

The hugely obese nymph simply shrugged, her whole body rippling and jiggling by the tiny movement.

“Probably…is…due...to…the…new…environment.”

“Yeah…must be. How it was for …you?”

The girl motioned to Kai to sit down on one of the benches that ran all around the corridors and, once seated and able to breath, she managed to speak with almost no impediment.

“Well, my first day here I wasn’t with Miss Vour… I was somewhere else, I can’t recall which floor exactly but…I remember some of the lessons they were giving…us.

It was all related to how our body moves and it is… perceived by others. I remember there was this teacher…a huge man who wanted us to put on… muscles upon muscles. I, as a Nymph, have lots of bountiful curves but…not of the same kind he wanted.


After some time, he began to pick on me, personally…and then I couldn’t stand him no longer. I remember I threatened to leave this…school. But then they decided to move me here…With Miss Vour.

It has been great. I still have all of my…Healthy curves and I’m still growing…Healthier.”

“Wow…You’ve been very lucky, then…”

“I always thought so too…until this morning, when Miss Vour…revealed me that…she wanted me here.”

“Really!? Wow! She requested you personally. That’s great…”

“Yeah…and she told me even something about you too.”

Kai’s elven ears perked up and she turned toward her friend, trying to pry the information from her lips.

“I’ll tell you Kai…But first we’ve got to have our mid-morning…snack. Teacher’s order remember?”

As the two began, once again, moving toward the mess hall, they began joking and laughing and talking about their differences and different experiences, until they finally arrived at the mess hall, where Jen could sit and restore her energies.

They hadn’t seated for nearly two minutes that a busty, red skinned waitress was already coming toward them, carrying two overly large trays, placing them neatly in front of the two girls.

“Here, enjoy your meals.”

Kai looked surprised at the waitress and started to ask but, the woman answered back as if she already knew the question.

“Your Floor Representative gave us a specific schedule to follow. As soon as we saw you enter we checked our list and brought to you your respective meals. For you Wood Elf, Kaihera right?, four double cheeseburgers each with its complimentary of fries and a whole apple pie, which is in the oven as we speak, just to keep it hot and ready for you.

For you my healthy Nymph, instead, there is your usual dozen fried chickens with their complimentary six pounds of nachos. In a few moments I’ll bring you both your drinks.

Then, as soon as your helpers arrive you can start your meal. Hope you enjoy.”

As the waitress moved away, Kai turned her inquisitive glance toward her jiggly friend.

“Helpers?”

“Yes.
Since it’s so tiring…to grow healthy…Miss Vour insisted…for those who were growing …faster than the others…to be served by these….Helpers.

They will…help you…eat and grow healthier and healthier…You’ll see…Here they…come…”

Kai turned around and saw six little creatures, so similar to bare skinned chimpanzee who, dressed with grey garments, began chittering in a strange language as they approached the two girls.

Jen gave a slight nod and three of the creatures jumped on her body, one near her mouth, the second near her belly button and the third on the table, near the food.

Kai watched in awe as the three creatures began passing each other the food, moving it swiftly and precisely, until it was placed gently in the ever growing Nymph’s mouth, which munched on it, moaning in pleasure. Kai suddenly felt a tug at her ill-fitting uniform and, looking down, she saw one of the other three creatures looking at her hopefully, while the other two in the back seemed on the verge of crying.

“J-Jen?”

“Mmmph…mmm…Oh…*Gulp*…right…you gotta…give them…permission….to be…MMmmphm…fed…*ulp!*…”

The double chinned elf looked again at the creatures trying to decide what to do…
1111111111111111111111111111.title: Not only friendship grows…

choices: Stuffed Fairies, an Underworld Delicacy ( Warning Vore content)
11111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kai looked at the three and spoke softly, caressing the first one on the long pointed ears.

“You can proceed but, be gentle…it’s my first time.”

The three Imps, for that’s what they really were, beamed at this news and, initially, began to jump and chitter with excitement, until the first one stopped the other two calming them down.

After this initial outburst, the three creatures assumed the same formation as did their friends and soon began moving the food from the tray toward the gaping mouth of Kai, letting her have bites of the cheeseburgers slowly and calmly, letting her set the pace.

Kai felt in heaven, between the delicious taste of the food and the possibility to rub her belly with both hands she truly felt a lot better and, as more food kept arriving into her mouth, she completely forgot her nightmare and focused only on enjoying the meal.

The duo, even when their trays had been emptied, didn’t move from their seat as the imps began to knead and massage their growing bodies, while waiting for the waitresses to bring more.

As hours passed and the waitresses kept bringing a constant flow of food, the two fattening girls didn’t even think about stopping, letting the imps feed them as much as they could. Kai looked at Jen, feeling jealous of her Healthy body as the hugely nymph kept swallowing entire burgers as if they were only tiny morsels.

Kai couldn’t see herself very well, but if she could have, she would have realized that she wasn’t so far behind as she thought. Her face was now quite chubby, her prominent double chin was already changing, giving off the hint of a third one coming along. Her torso was much larger than what she had when she had entered the school, with stacks of back fat rolls that pushed her tight bra upward and partially submerging it.

Her breast were inflating like crazy, changing from the two perky balloons she once had to two jello like flesh sacks which trembled at her every movement and that began to be pulled toward the ground due to the gravity. Her arms and legs were also packed and much softer, her thighs especially were going to touch each other as soon as she would have stood up.

But it was her belly that had to be the center of attention.

A huge, dome shaped, temple dedicated to gluttony, as full as she was it had to be at least beach ball sized and, as more food was shoveled inside her maw, it still grew larger and tighter.

Her uniform had ripped out hours before, unable to contain all of that flesh, leaving her with only some rags that completely failed in covering her undies, which were covered instead with her belly fat.
The Nymph instead didn’t change that much but, after all, she had entered in the mess hall already at her almost maximum potential.

Still, she now needed a lot of food only to feel slightly sated and the imps were more than happy to oblige the huge quivering form with all the food they could grab.

As the two growing girls kept eating, one of Kai’s little helpers noticed the lustful glances that the elf was shooting to her friend body and, feeling joy in serving her, wanted to help her as much as he could. Alas, there wasn’t much food left so he had to come up with a different solution. Slowly he turned around looking for anything that could give him an idea.

At a nearby table he saw a group of fattened up Fairies, so big and juicy that their wings were now purely ornamental. Under his stare he saw them blindly stuffing themselves at a meal that would have been rather large even for a full grown human.

As he was observing them, he noticed that some of them were so full that they had slipped into a food coma like sleep, their bodies resembling more a ripe, juicy orange than the lithe body they had to have in the past. Moreover, he observed that the other fairies seemed unconcerned about their sleeping friends, abandoning them behind as they kept on glutting themselves, until they reached the same point of fullness.

He made to warn the other imps about that discovery when he realized, from his vantage point atop Kai’s torso, that the huge door that led to the fridge was open and unguarded. It could have taken the three of them less than a minute to snuck inside and steal some of those fattening sweets.

His stare moved from the Fairies to the Fridge, as he pondered on his options and on the best solution to help their temporary Master.
11111111111111111111111111111.title: Aw, they’re so cute! Let them feed...

choices: Nah, I’m full. Better go for a nap…
111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The Head Imp focused his stare on the Fairies table, deciding that nothing would have helped her Temporary Master grow better than some stuffed Fairies. Whispering to his companions, while Kaihera was rubbing her full and tight gut, burping away to make some more space, two of the imps jumped and moved swiftly toward the table of the Fairies closing in on the two of the first small-ish students that they encountered.

These two were as similar as they could be, only difference between them was, apart from their eyes color, in the fact that the first one was all belly stuffed, while her friend was completely apple shaped. The two Imps grabbed the weakened preys and, albeit slowly due to their weight, they managed to bring them across the table, toward their Temporary Master.

Suddenly Kaihera found in front of her eyes one of her helpers who was gesticulating something, the elven girl while not very bright, understood after a few times what the little creature was trying to tell her and, slowly, she turned toward her friend, which was almost asleep.

“J-Jen?”

“Uh? Oh…yes, Kai?”

“um…there is one of the…helpers here. He want me to…swallow something…er…is it safe?”

“Yeah. They will never…harm you…Maybe he found some…hard candies that…would break your teeth…if munched on…Go ahead….it will…be worth it…”

The obese Elf turned her staring eyes at the imp and slowly nodded, opening her mouth as wide as she could, while looking at the ceiling. She heard the creatures move on her body, as she felt a hefty weight being transported and soon enough something began to be pushed against her lips. As Kai felt the unknown object being pushed she tried her best to keep her mouth open as much as she could.

Out of her sight, however, the imps had brought the first ball-shaped and orange-sized fairy just in front of their Temporary Master mouth, trying to let the stuffed creature enter the gaping wet depth.

Unfortunately, they realized that it wasn’t going to be easy, as the fairy full body was slightly bigger than Kaihera’s mouth.

This didn’t stop them from pushing and pushing until, with a small *pop*, the first Fairy passed between the elven lips and stopped in her mouth. At this point the Head Imp moved in front of Kai’s eyes and motioned for her to close her mouth and swallow, while his two companion, took positions around her throat, massaging it, trying to ease the passage of the rather big morsel.

When Kai had heard the small sound she was greeted by a sweet and sparkly taste on her tongue, she tried to determine what it was by moving her tongue around it but it only seemed to her a ball shaped something. As she saw the signs from the creatures around her, motioning to her to swallow the elf closed her eyes and began trying.

But the morsel, whatever it was, was too big for her to send it down in one step.

She was going to spit it out when she noticed the Head Imp pushing on her own cheeks and, at the same time, she felt the other two trying their best, kneading and massaging her throat to help her.

Strengthened by this communal effort she decided to give it another try and, slowly, she began to feel as if the morsel in her mouth was moving toward her back throat. Kai pushed with all of her might, trying to move the big snack until she finally felt it slosh in her throat and finally land in a splash-like noise in her belly.

Suddenly she felt hilariously happy, as if the morsel just swallowed was nothing more than a bundle of happiness and joy, wrapped in some delicious tasting covers. The imps gathered around her chubby face glancing at her with an inquisitive look, as if asking if she was ready for more.

Kai had never felt better, she still didn’t know what that snack was but, it had been so delicious that she, almost, begged for more, causing a wave of happiness in the imps surrounding her.

As one of them remained there to distract her, the other two rapidly formed a chain and began moving the stuffed out spherical fairies from their table to the one where the engorged belly of Kaihera was resting, producing strange grumbling sounds as the food inside of it was being digested and converted into fat.

Soon enough almost all the fairies were relocated near the almost stuffed to the brim elf, which was still trying to recover from that last snack. Burping a little, Kaihera turned her stare on Jennifer , noticing that the nymph had fallen asleep and her helpers were milling around watching her curiously, almost as if they were wondering if they could join.

Kai was feeling pretty full and tired, by this point, but still she felt some kind of hunger for those, oh so tasty, snacks.

Was she really ready to indulge again and eat until full or was it better to stop now?
111111111111111111111111111111.title: To be an unconscious Predator

choices: Stuff the Fairy and let her live…
Go to the waitresses and ask for help…
1111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kai reasoned that she still had plenty to do to grow healthy and strong as Miss Vour wanted, so she motioned with her head to the Imps surrounding her, nodding and giving them her consent.

She remained motionless, as the imps surrounding her did all the job, she even realized that, thanks to the first morsel her throat seemed to facilitate the passage of the other snacks, letting her swallow them with much more ease than the first one.

As the process began to be swifter and swifter, she simply basked in the sensation of her ever growing stomach as it grew larger and larger as more of those spheres arrived in her belly. The Imps had really done their job for her, asking the support of the other three and forming a quick moving chain, through which they moved each of the stuffed fairies until they were brought to Kaihera’s mouth and, finally, to her apparently bottomless stomach.

After almost one hour of this the Imps realized that there was only one last Fairy on the adjacent table, problem was that not only she was the biggest of the lot having reached water melon proportions, but it was still awake and eating away at the huge amount of food that she was now left alone with.

The imps looked upward, toward Kaihera, which was visibly under the effect of consuming many fairies, as she was feeling euphoric and full of joy. Of course she didn’t know that that was a common side effect of digesting fairies, but as happy as she was she could have cared less. She lay on her now creaking chair, stroking her hugely engorged belly.

She didn’t even notice the fact that she was practically nude, without counting her bra, which was overflowing breast flesh, and her undies, now practically invisible on the front due to her engorged gut. Still Kaihera didn’t move or ask to stop, she simply lay there too dazed to do nothing more than passively wait for the next morsel.

The Imps wanted to feed their Master to the fullest, and that implied that last fairy, but they were worried in regarding to her size and for her lack of a food coma like sleep. Some of them tried to approach it from behind but, every time they came near her bloated form, the fairy began growling like a feral beast, forcing the imps to retreat in fear.

The head imp scratched his bald head as he watched the bloated creature as she kept on gorging on the food she had around herself, grunting every time she tried to reach something that was just too far away.

In that moment the solution to one of his problem came to his mind.

If his companions began to feed the fairy, she would probably let them come closer to her, so much so that it would be easier for them to snatch her away from the table and bring her to their Temporary master.

The main problem instead, would only get worse. If the little, once flying, woman got fatter, she would have gotten bigger and it would have been even more difficult for them to fit her inside the Master mouth. Still, with nothing better to do he gave the order and the other five imps scurried over to the adjacent table, each collecting whatever left over that had been out of reach to the bloated little woman, offering it to her.

The Fairy, hearing the scuttling of little feet turned around as much as she could, growling in anger, until she realized that those imps were there offering food.

To her!

With a smile plastered on her face she opened her little mouth, accepting eagerly those offerings and gulping down whatever was placed in there. The Imps, by their side, found that it was truly easy to satisfy that little master and redoubled their efforts, bringing more and more to the fairy which never refused anything or lost time in munching, seemingly able to gather all the offerings in her mouth and then simply swallow them, helping her form to grow rounder and fatter with every bite.

The Head Imp looked at the situation with depressed eyes, how could he solve this situation? How could he stuff that hugely bloated fairy in her Temporary Master stomach?

Seeing as his imps were so happily stuffing her full he could simply let it go and let Kaihera fall asleep to digest her already humongous meal, or he could ask for the assistance of one of the Waitresses, but those never did something for free.
1111111111111111111111111111111.title: Just one more…and maybe another…and another…

choices: Follow DVour and the two jiggly beauties
11111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The Head Imp turned around watching the peaceful expression on Kaihera’s face. The Temporary Master had already fallen asleep, digesting her humongous meals and those prey’s that had been pushed inside her. Turning around he saw that also the fairy was reaching her fullness, seeing as she began to slow down in her consumption of the food offered by his imps.

With the sensation of a job well done he began gathering his minions to leave the mess hall but suddenly something in his gut clenched in fear. He slowly turned his head and saw that one of the Demons that lived there was watching him intently.

He knew them all, they were his true masters afterall, and knew which one was dangerous and which wasn’t. Trembling with fear he realized that one of the oldest and most powerful one was the one observing him.

DVour.

The imp bowed low to the demoness and moved swiftly to kneel in front of her, his eyes casted low as he waited for her.

The demoness looked at the scene in front of her, she saw Jennifer Nymph, with her bulbous girth crashed on the floor, in a deep slumber, after what it seemed to be a glorious stuffing for the once lithe nymph. Beside her, a few feet of distance, there was the forms of Kaihera the Wood Elf, her newest addiction and a prime target for The Grand Master. Only then she noticed that there was also a seemingly perfect sphere of fat on the table, with a pair of partially transparent wings that , surely, were now purely ornamental.

The eyes of the Demoness focused on the Head Imp, still kneeling in front of her.

“You. What have you done, here?”

The Imp began chittering in his native language, stuttering with fear as he reported each and every action they had taken to serve the two fattened up young women, adding then that at the end they had also performed a similar service also to the Fairy.

“Wel, well…Seems to me that someone in this building has some brains and knows his place. A very good job…Fool.”

The Head Imp beamed at the compliment and seemed to stand even taller than he was at the Demoness mention of his True Name.

He garbled something about his duty to be performed and began moving away when the sharp tone of the Demoness stopped him in his tracks.

“Did I told you, you could leave?

Still, you’ve done a good job and managed to please me with your actions, so I will grant you a boon, this time for the audacity of walking away without my permission. Now, are you sure the Elf wasn’t aware of what was she eating at the end?”

Fool, the Head Imp, nodded vigorously, as he chittered about the precaution they had taken to avoid any kind of issue with their temporary masters. Quickly followed by the rest of his gang, which had gathered behind him as if he could protect them all.

“Good. Now, I suggest you to pick your minions and go to Miss DMentia Office. Bring her this chit” she said as a small chit of paper appeared between her fingers as she gave it to the small creature.

As she continued, Fool, brought the paper chit to his eyes, while keeping it in both hands questioning quizzically the Demoness for its purpose.

“This chit is a permit from me giving you free access to the Material World for you and yours. A list of preys will be given to you and you’ll be able to do whatever you wish to your designated prize.

You’ll have a month to enjoy yourselves and, if you manage to corrupt and / or freak out your target…I will see that it will be taken to you for your “ direct” custody. Now go, and leave me alone with my precious students.”

As the imps scuttled away, the demoness turned toward the two fattened up masses of quivering flesh asleep in the mess hall and couldn't keep a soft laught from escaping through her lips.

"Oh, you're growing so healty, my dears. I just hope you'll be able to involve your newbie's friends as soon as you will meet them..."
11111111111111111111111111111111.title: Stuffing the Fairy and letting her live a fat life

111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The demoness moved swiftly toward the tables where her two students had fallen asleep. With a gentle touch she checked how good was the growth of her two prized ‘students’.

Jennifer Nymph was almost at her maximum potential. The once almost anorexic cheerleader had turned, under her precious care, in the jiggling and wobbling mountain that now stood before her. The demoness smiled at the vision of the soon to be immobile nymph, she would enjoy watching her struggle to move, while being anchored to the ground by her own weight.

‘Yes’ she thought to herself ‘ Soon the nymph will be ready to be sent to her Grand Master. I just hope she does give her back to me. I would love to have her as my assistant…’

With that she simply turned on her heels, facing the other mound of jiggly fat in the classroom. Kaihera.

Dvour almost hovered off the floor as she assessed the gain of the wood elf, touching and measuring with her own eyes at the girth of the young bimbo. She smiled when she reached her conclusion.

Even though the Elf wasn’t, yet, the mountain of fat that Nymphy there was, she had also grown hugely in the few days she had been with them. Largely was due to the enchantments she herself had casted on the girl, but there was also this…this gluttony, this unending hunger that young Kai showed during her misadventures, which placed her just below the nymph in the top ten of the favorites for the demoness.

A sudden thought caught her attention. Dvour realized that of all the students under her ‘care’ these two were by far the best she had seen in that year and the thought of losing them both began to prey on her. Sure, there were many others that were just as ready to blimp themselves up for her but these two were something different.

With that thought in mind she assessed the situation and, after verifying to be literally alone with them she reached her decision.

Jennifer Nymph was far too gone to be saved from the meeting with the Grand Master, she had to go even though it break the Demoness desire to see her masterpiece without knowing if it would be given back, or in which condition it would return.

But Kai was a different matter.

The young Elf was so new and yet had managed to impress her for both her appetite and her luck. After all she had survived two encounters with the demons who ruled the school without, almost, any repercussion. No, she had to try to slow down the young elf and keep her for as long as she could and there was but one action that she could do. Dvour brought forward her hand, toward the rock hard gut of the elf until it touched that tight as a drum surface.

She could almost feel the essence of those fairies that were being digested inside Kai’s body and that thought almost sent her over the edge but, she managed to calm herself.
