Slowly, her hand began to erupts tiny purple flames, which seemed to dance on the engorged gut in front of her, until they revealed what seemed to be a simple tattoo but were, in reality, the two enchantment she had casted on the elf, to let her grow faster and fattier than what could have been possible. She knew that Her Master would have felt the change but she hoped that offering her the Nymph she could please Her enough to let her keep Kaihera for a while more.

Dvour dig her purple flamed claws in the elf gut and, as if she had torn away a sheet of paper, the tattoo slowly vanished. For some minutes everything seemed quiet in the mess hall and the demoness was almost releasing a satisfied breath when, suddenly, she heard her Master voice in her mind.

And it was…
111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Three tasty morsels at the price of two

choices: The fairy wasn’t sleeping! She heard everything!
1111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
‘Dvour, my faithful servant. I felt some changes in the life of the Elf that has been promised to me. What are you doing?’

DVour cringed when she herd the Master voice in her head, she had thought that a small change as that could pass unnoticed from the ever watchful eye of Hers, but it seemed pointless to debate.

She had been contacted and now needed to answer, thrutfully for the being with which she was in contact could read it just out of her mind.

‘Grand Master, I am here, ever faithful to your orders, I’ve always defended those in my care that were promised to…’

‘Cut the chase, Dvour, tell me the why’s.’

‘I…I wil give you the Nymph as it was commanded, My Mistress, but…But I hoped to be able to keep under my care the Elf, only until I could find a reasonable substitute. I…I have taken away the enchantment from her in order to…To enjoy what time I have with this one, Mistress.’

‘I see.
Still, you had promised me two offerings…not one. So why should I give you such a reward for, uhm?’

The demoness kneeled in the mess hall, kind of happy of being alone, except for the two still asleep behemoths around her.

‘Grand Master. With all due respect, the nymph one will be given to you shortly, to…to use her as per your wish. But the elf is just a youngling and I wish to give her to you just as she has reached her maximum potential.
As I have always done, Master.’

‘Ha! I can see your thoughts about the nymph, DVour. You’ve grown attached to it and are beginning to feel something for her.

Yes, I can feel it.

Some may find it disdainuful for a Demon to experience emotions as this, surely you know that?

Still, when other have showered me with dozens of bland, little gifts, it has always been you who have given the most tasty, the most succulent gifts. And those are the ones that I keep remembering for their deliciousness.

Very well, DVour, I shall return to you the Nymph to do with her whatever you please, if she survive of course. and as for the other one, the young Elf, I will expect something that far surpasses the current gift…flavour.’

At that The demoness seemed to be on the point of bursting with joy. Her Master not only had agreed with her keeping the Elf, but also promised to give back that luscious piece of meat called Jennifer Nymph. Still her joy stopped abruptly when she heard, once again, her Master demanding voice filling her mind.

‘One last thing.

Bring the Elf amidst her friends. Among them I felt something rare. Something I want for myself. Assist me in locating this presence and your wishes will be made true…

Remember my words, and heed to my commands, faithful, faithful DVour…’

When the mental link was definitively interrupted the demoness could do nothing more than breath, trying to regain her composure as her stare moved toward the two girls in the room with her.

“Jen, you’ll soon be one with the Grand Master. I hope you manage to survive. And you, young and foolish, Kai. You will bring your friends to me and I’ll give to Her whatever she wishes. You’ll be my ticket to become a being so powerful to be second only to my Mistress.”

As she turned to wake up the two girls, she finally remembered about the thir presence in the Mess Hall, the bloated Fairy which the Imps had stuffed full of food.

“And you. You, my young fairy arrive just in time to fill Jen’s place. I’ll make sure you grow at least as healthy as she is.”
1111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Mellowed by the offerings...

11111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
When Kaihera awoke she found herself in her room, she had hazy memories of what had happened in the mess hall, she remembered though how those little creatures had helped her to grow healthy. As she turned her jiggling bulk in her bed, she noticed suddenly an envelope on her bedside table. Curious she began to rose, sitting in the bed and only then she noticed what changes her body had gone against.

Looking down she noticed immediately how her breast had grown.

She giggled when she tried to lift one of them with her chubby hand, smiling in seeing it so big that it was completely engulfing her hand in breast-fat, hiding it from view while enveloping it in its pull by the gravity. Then she noticed, or to say the truth she felt with her free hand, her belly. It was so soft and squishy that another round of giggles escaped her lips as her hand closed down on one of her two belly rolls.

She realized she had really grown healthy under Miss Vour diet, but still the thought of having grown fatter never entered her little mind.

Instead she wanted only to give her most deep thanks to her Floor Rep. for the advices and for bringing her on the right path to Healthiness. It was at that moment that, even though she could smell something delicious coming from the kitchen, she remembered of the envelope and, hastily she opened it to read its content.

Inside the Envelope there were three letters, the first one was signed as ‘J. Nymph’ and so had to be from what she considered as her first best friend in the Demonatium School.

She wanted to read it immediately but decided first to check the other two.

As she checked them out she noticed they were both from Miss Vour and so, noticing the official paper they were written on she began to read.


“Miss Kaihera,

It is with pleasure that, in the name of Demonatrium High School for the Talented Non-Humans, I notify you that, due to recent recommendation from both your Class Representative, Miss Jennifer Nymph, and from your Floor Representative, Miss DVour, your ’one month probation from exploring the School grounds’ has been revoked.

You are now entitled to move between the various wings of the school, while wearing the included medallion that certify this approval.

Giving you, once again, our congratulations,

Miss DVour, Teacher & Floor Representative of the Health and Fitness Wing of the Demonatrium High School. ”

As soon as Kai had finished reading she felt ready to explode from the joy and happiness she felt. Not only her Best Friend Jennifer had vouched for her but also Miss Vour! The day, she thought, couldn’t start in a better way.

Kai was already planning to rise from the bed and see how her old friends were doing when she remembered the other two envelopes.
The first one, still from Miss Vour, left her with a strange feeling.

It was a notification that she was soon going to have a new roommate and classmate with a final note that she wasn’t sure she understood. Something about saying goodbye to a friend.


The second letter turned her strange feeling in tears.

‘Dear Kai,

I’m Jennifer and I’m sorry if I couldn’t come to salute you personally but when I came you were sleeping so peacefully that I didn’t want to disturb you.

For that reason I’m writing you this letter.

Even though we’ve known each other for just a few days, I’ve felt instantly a connection between the two of us and I would even be so bold to say that we could have been the best of friends together.

Alas the time for my trip with Miss Vour for the Campus Examination test has come and I’ve got to go there to proceed with my studies here at this school.

When I was like you, freshly arrived, I was insecure and shy of everything but, thanks to Miss Vour I’ve discovered a world I didn’t even know it had existed. You’re so joyful and fun to stay with and I hope that you’ll stay that way so that when I get back we can start again with our friendship, wouldn’t be fun?

Now, a word of caution, there will be people who will try to convince you that you’re something that you’re not or that will try to make you feel useless by calling you with names.

Just ignore them and follow the advices that Miss Vour will give you. Do that, follow your hearth and everything will be fine.

With a hug,

Jennifer Nymph ’

When Kai recovered she felt sad for the departure of her friend but still, she was sure that they were going to meet again and so that placed a smile on her chubby face.

Suddenly a low growl erupted from her belly, at which she chuckled before commenting with a “Well, since I’m awake I could go for some Breakfast, I still need to follow Miss Vour diet….or Maybe I could go and check for my twin and the rest of my friends from old?”
11111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A new beginning...

choices: Follow Wendy to a Real Breakfast
111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kaihera stood beside her bed, covered in a robe which managed to, barely, cover all of her as she mulled in thought on what to do at that very moment.

Suddenly a voice from the kitchen began to sing in a crystal clear voice, vocalizing a melody without any true word in it and that sound seemed to halo the chubby elf in reaching a decision. With her slow waddle she left her bedroom and soon had crossed the living room toward the small kitchen they had in their apartment.

Then she froze as she saw who was the owner of that marvelous voice.


Using some chairs to help herself up, the improvised cook moved quite swiftly, considering her rounded form at least, between the pans and the raw ingredients that awaited on the counter near the sink.

The girl was none other than the Fairy that the Imps, during the feeding session in the mess hall, had fattened up and left alone instead of stuffing her down Kai’s gullet.

The girl didn’t remember much of what had happened at the mess hall, in fact she was sure of having gone there with some of her friends but since then she had found herself alone and transferred to another room, in a different wing of the building.

She still was mulling on what the two Floor reps had said to her, at that time.

The first one, Miss DSpair, was her formet Floor rep. and she had told her that in spite of her nature as a Fairy and the abilities she had, it seemed that she could perform better for another teacher. And here came her current Floor Rep., Miss DVour, which seemed to have been impressed with the Fairy culinary skills and wanted to take her under her wing.

The girl itself was aware of her capacities behind a stove, for she was usually the one providing food to her group of friends, enjoying every inch of extra flesh that managed to appear on said friends but, from here to impress a teacher?

She had never known to be so able and so, she had agreed to switch to the Health and Fitness wing of Demonatrium High school.

As she recalled those recent memories her hands never stopped moving, preparing a veritable feast until she realized and turned around to prepare the table. As soon as she had done so she found at the doorframe a veritable chubby elf that was staring at her as if mesmerized.

“Umm…Hi?”

“Oh my gosh! You’re so cute!”

Kai had never seen a Fairy.

She knew they existed and had seen some of them on the television but, due to the generally reserved nature of these creatures toward the rest of the inhabitants of earth, she had never been able to meet one in person. And now, standing in front of her there was one that, as per Miss Vour Health standard, was well on her way to being very healthy!

“Um, Thanks? I-I’m Wendy…er…Nice to meet you..?”

As Kai wasn’t used in meeting a Fairy, so Wendy wasn’t used in meeting something that it wasn’t one. Sure the school personnel was nice and gentle but it had always been awkward for her to relate with others, and that was the reason for which, Fairies usually traveled around in packs and not alone.

Still, she was caught off guard when the Elf answered her in a girlish voice, as she moved toward her until she kneeled, slowly and with apparent fatigue, near her.

“Oh, you’re so cute, and those wings of yours? I would love to have some just like them! I…I mean, sorry…I’m Kaihera, but friends just call me Kai. You…You’re my new roommate?”

For some reason, Wendy, after the initial surprise, seemed to feel at ease, especially when the Elf moved closer.

It was as if there was something of Fairies origins into this girl.

Plus, she realized, she seemed a good girl, even if she was a Huge One.

Naturally, Wendy, wasn’t referring to Kai’s weight but using instead something like an archaic expression created by the Faeries to describe those of Humanoid constitution. Considering also that Kai was the first Elf she had ever seen she thought that her body form was supposed to be so…’fluffy’.

“Yes, and look. I’ve prepared a little breakfast for us to enjoy. It’s not so much but it should help us tide over until we go to the mess hall. What do you think?”

Kai stared at the table in the kitchen admiring the food that was there and her belly, just then moaned her approval for the idea. The fairy just chuckled and shooing Kai out of the kitchen, began moving the plates from the kitchen to the living room. She had never worked her charms on an Elf before but, if it had worked on fairies, why shouldn’t work also for the other races?

As she let her roommate start her pre-breakfast she had to admit that the girl she had been paired with seemed really nice and so, she couldn’t stop from feeling a tinge of guilt knowing that she was going to let this girl grows just for her own pleasure.

Kai awaited as long as she could and, when Wendy gave her the signal, she launched on the ‘small pre-breakfast’ as if she was starving. She seemed to enjoy so much the meal that she didn’t even notice the small, but crucial, fact that Wendy wasn’t eating any of the meal.

The fairy was sitting calmly on a chair, awaiting for the space to be made on the table in the living room, in order to move the remaining of the meal toward her new roommate.

The elf didn’t seem to mind as she kept bringing food from the table to her mouth, lost in deliciousness of the sugary and fried foods that was left in front of her. Only an hour later she, finally stopped herself, feeling definitively sated, if not full.

Kai looked then at Wendy and smile dazedly as she began to unconsciously rub her full and distended belly. The robe, which was barely sufficient to cover her before, now was completely useless as her full belly pushed against the cord that the Elf had around it to keep it closed.

Wendy smiled and managed to distract her roommate with some small talk, long enough to clear the table from the debris of the meal. In order to avoid for her new friend to find out how much she had been really eating.

“Uff. That’s better, won’t you say so, Kai?”

“Urg…Y-Yeah…Like…*Urp*…Totally”

“Good. Now, let me clean a few things up and, after dressing ourselves we can go to the Mess hall for the real breakfast.”

Kai, even though was all aboard with Miss Vour diet to eat massive amounts of food at every meal, was feeling pretty stuffed and tried to excuse herself without appearing like she didn’t wanto to go with her new friend, after all, Wendy seemed so nice and she had also offered her that nice snack.

“W-Well…I-I think…I’ve got some…oof…Some class to attend to…”

“Class? You’ve got class on the week-ends?” said the fairy looking at her with an arched brow.

Kai could have given herself a slap, how could she have forgotten that it was already the Week-end?

In truth, time for her had passed quite differently than for the others inhabitants of the school. After the massive feast she and Jennifer Nymph had fallen prey to on their first day of actual lessons, Kaihera had been left temporarily suspended in the nursery, as DVour and the Head-Nurse DCeive managed to remove from her the enchantments regarding her appetite and her digestion, while keeping her stable and alive.

So, even though she had done truly only part of the first lesson, for all the others she was already a week old in the school.

Be as it may, Kai didn’t want to offend her new friend but, at the same time was feeling quite full and didn’t know if she was up to a real breakfast in the Mess Hall.

What could she do?
111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: …There has to be satisfaction

choices: Wendy tries to push the elf to eat more
1111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kai felt trapped, she couldn’t refuse to follow her new roommate, especially since she seemed so kind and friendly. But she was feeling so full that she didn’t know if she could eat a single more bite.

Still, in the end she let her head fall, as much as it was possible for her double chin and wide neck, and began to waddle toward her room to wear the uniform. As she went to her room to change she passed in front of her mirror and stood there watching herself.

After a few seconds she began to pose in front of the mirror, enjoying the reflex from the same. She didn’t seem to realize how heavy had she become, as she grabbed her thick love handles and jiggled her full paunch. With a smile on her chubby face she began again the long trek toward her room, where she almost collapsed on her bed, without any breath.

A long hour later both girls emerged from their own rooms, both wearing the uniforms even though Kai’s one was tighter than she remembered. She dismissed the thought, giving the fault to the laundry’s drier and tried, huffing and puffing, to keep the pace of Wendy as the fairy moved toward the mess hall.

To say the truth, Wendy was starving.

Sure she had fed her roommate all that food but, in the ecstasy of the moment she hadn’t grabbed anything for herself and now she felt an almost feral hunger in the pit of her, not so small, belly.
As soon as the two entered the mess hall Kai stood on the door wordlessly, while watching dozens of teens hungrily eating out of huge mounds of breakfast foods. While, at the counters, there were the oldest students which were balancing more than one tray on their fat, jiggling bodies.

The two girls quickly moved through the mess hall and began to fill their trays with their breakfast. Kai’s was taking only a little, since she wasn’t feeling all that hungry, but Wendy was really outdoing herself.

The Fairy was grabbing lots and lots of fried eggs, bacon strips and waffles, placing them all in her tray, until the weight of the tray itself became a burden for the shorter humanoid. Kai, which was following her roommate closely, saw her struggling and moved to help her, remaining surprised at how heavy her friend tray was.

Still the two managed to reach an empty table and began their Real Breakfast. But, as they were eating…
1111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Onwards to the Mess Hall!

11111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As the two were busy with their breakfasts, eating away with gusto, enjoying the rich and savory plates, a figure began to move toward them.
It moved silently and almost stealthily, avoiding the other students who walked around the mess hall, without taking its eyes out of Kai’s figure. But when it was only a foot or two away from the chubby blonde, it suddenly stopped.

The figure could be seen by other students, looking around as if deciding what to do, without moving forward anymore but instead as if rooted in place. Soon a low murmur began to spread in the mess hall, coming from those people who had begun noticing that lone motionless figure.

As if a discussion had taken place in the mind of the motionless figure, and a decision reached, this one sprinted forward and moved around the table until it was right in front of Kai.

“Kai…Kaihera? Is it really you?”



Kai was finishing down the last few pancakes that her roommate had placed onto her plate. True to her word she had taken only a small amount of food on her own tray but, she hadn’t counted on Wendy’s intervention.

All throughout the meal the fairy had quickly and, most often than not, unnoticing placed some of her own portions to the elf girl beside her. Kai, had noticed her roommate behavior but didn’t say anything about it.
Partly because she didn’t want to sound rude and, partly, since her own gluttony pushed her forward.

Still, when she heard a voice calling her by name she broke from the enchantment of the food and looked at the girl before squealing in surprise.

It was…
11111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kaihera? Is…Is it really you?

choices: Try to find a way to have the two of them
111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Faihera was a Dark Elf.

They had the nasty reputation of being the most agile, cunning and cruel of all the Elven Fiefdoms.
But as she saw almost 300 lbs of wood elf crashing upon her she froze in fear and awe, while letting a tiny mewling sound as her Big sister Kaihera, closed her in a tight embrace squealing in pleasure.

She was stunned to find her sister had grown so much, that the situation left her entirely speechless.

Slowly by slowly, though, the love she felt for her, sometimes so foolish, sister seeped through the cold hearted appearance she had always shown to the world and she returned the hug, while the hint of a smile appeared on her face.

As the two separated they both turned in unison toward the fairy as she let out a polite cough, trying to make her presence noticeable.

“Oh! Right. Wendy, this is Faihera, my little sister. Sis? This is Wendy my roommate.”

The two of them greeted each other while thinking very different thoughts about each other.

Fai couldn’t stop herself from thinking that it had been fault of the round fairy if her sister had grown so large in such a short time. While Wendy could only think that, not only the standard size for the elves had to be that fluffy one, but that with both the elven girls around she could try and make of them her new pets project.

Especially considering that while her roommate, Kai, was all over chubby, her sister, while being nowhere near thin herself, seemed to concentrate all of her wonderful fat in her badonkadonk ass and her globular boobs, making her a huge hourglass figure.
Wendy was initially mesmerized by the dark skinned elf, she was so strange with her indigo skin and yet, watching her jiggling fat ripple at her every movement was turning on and on the rotund fairy.

Kaihera was big and was a pretty big eater but, this Faihera had to really be something else. As the two sisters were busy, Wendy let her keys drop under the table and quickly she lowered herself and again she was stunned in silence by the lower body of the Dark Elf.

So much jiggly cellulite, rippling and trembling at her every breath, so much skin pouring over the tight confines of the short shorts she was wearing. Drool began to fall from Wendy’s mouth as she imagined herself swimming in that sea of cushiony ass fat. But as she collected her keyes and rose she found a similar scenery up top. The knockers of Fai were as big as her ass cheecks, if not bigger, and just as her ass they were all composed of drooping, jello-like fat.

At her every movement they bounced and jiggled, as if they were alive and busy in performing a tribal dance ceremony, as if she was actively trying to entice her to jump right in that jiggly cleavage.

As she watched the two sister seated at the table, eating and chatting together, Wendy began fidgeting under the table, trying to decide what to do with the two Elven girls. She had to do something about them.

She had to.

But what?
111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Faihera, the "Little" Sister

choices: Giggled and laughed at her sister expenses
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Wendy practically drooled as she watched the two elven sisters catch up. She realized she had to get the two of them and keep them for herself. She had to. Whatever the cost.

For this reason, when the two had finally finished with their gorging, and were now resting on their chairs too bloated to move, Wendy did her move and spoke up in the middle of the sudden silence, interrupted only by the low moans and occasional burp.

“Kai? Since must be from a long time that the two of you were separated, why don’t we go, all together to our room in this wing? I’m sure it will be fun…We could do sleep-overs, movie nights,…what do you think?”

Kaihera smiled at the proposal of her roommate, while thanking the gods for a roommate so friendly and supportive to her.

“Well…I…For one…*Urp*…think is…a wonderful…idea. Fai?”

The dark skinned elf was slowly falling in a food coma. She knew she had eaten way too much but, to be near her Big Sister, she would have done it again and again. Still, the idea wasn’t so bad. Afterall, her Floor Representative had given her that badge that gave her access to the other parts if the school, so it was totally doable.

“S-Sure…*Urrap!*…ugh….S-Sorry…”

Almost an hour later, the three girls were in Wendy and Kai’s room, the two bloated beauties crashed on the couch, denting its surface with their heavy bodies, while Wendy was in the kitchen officialy cleaning it out. In truth she was preparing some snacks for the two elves, wishing to start out a routine pattern of constant snacking when they were all three in the room.

As she prepared and cooked and cleaned, Wendy could hear the two girls chatting and getting updates on the other one. A particular detail caught her attention and she stopped to listen it, if she wanted to let them grow she had to know everything about them.

Kaihera felt full, not completely full but, pleasantly so. In this state she let her sister update her and was truly surprised when Fai actually answered to her, and even more when she kept talking!

“So Fai, how’s the school treating you?”

“Well, Kai, it’s actually pretty good. The section I’m in has a pathetically easy classroom to follow, and most of my fellow companion are mostly…” Fai wanted to say the truth, that all of her floor mates were stupid bubble-heads but, she didn’t, choosing her words carefully. “…well…very…Cheerful? Sometimes they can be quite…a distraction…but the teachers don’t seem to mind.
Actually, tell you the truth, I think I’m enjoying a little bit too much their company…”

“What do you mean?”

“You see, apart from the fact that I’m acing every test they’re giving us, I…Well…” Fai looked around conspiratorially, as her voice became lower, almost like a whisper. “Don’t tell anyone but I’m enjoying the sleepovers with them, talking about boys and fashion and, and stuff…”

As Fai confessed her true feelings toward those activities she had always shunned, Kai….
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: …or How to have two Elven cows within one room

choices: The brownies and the milkshakes were ready to go
The Nachos and Tacos could be brought forward
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As Fai confessed her true feelings toward those activities she had always shunned Kai almost let out a howling laughter imagining her dark and somber sister while doing ‘girly’ stuff. Instead she managed to fake a hiccup and turned an interested stare toward her little twin, as if urging her to continue.

“Y-You know…Stuff…like, manicure, pedicure, styling of hairs…” as she began to remember those occasion a small satisfied smile appeared on her face, at which point Kai couldn’t hold back any longer, exploding in a long series of giggles and laughing.

“You should your face, little Sis! It’s hilarious! I…I can now tell you…You’re growing into a nice little girl, finally!”

As Kai kept on laughing and giggling, Fai became beet red as her stare began to turn from embarrassment to anger.

At this point, usually, Fai would start insulting her sister and, as she would reply, the two of them would be bickering for at least a week.

That time was different.

Kai was finally starting to breathe again as she noticed that Fai had her hands curled in fists and her head was kept low.

Suddenly worried she struggled to rise, to get nearer to her sister but, as soon as she had moved, Fai’s head rose and Kai could see the tears streaming down her twin face as she cried looking at her in shame.

“Fai…?”

“What!? I’m okay all right? It’s just…just…just something in my eyes…”

Kai realized only at that moment that her sister had, for the first time ever, opened up to her completely and what she did? She laughed in her face.
Ashamed she tried to move one hand on the dark elf shoulder but Fai slapped it away.

“Don’t touch me…Don’t…”

“Fai…I…I’m sorry. I…I shouldn’t have…P-Please forgive me.
Y-You know me..I...I don’t think…I’m such a stupid bubble-headed bimbo…”

Seeing her sister as she started to feel ashamed, something fierce lighted up in Fai’s heart. Sure, Kai had been cruel for laughing at her but, she had to remember that Kai wasn’t as attentive as many other to the etiquette or manners in general. In addition to all this, the fact that she couldn’t see her sister, quite chubby, face cringing in shame, made Fai to stop crying and move toward her twin, hugging her fiercely.

“Shhh…it’s okay. It’s fine, Kai, really it is. You’re not a bimbo. You may act as one, sometimes, but you’re not a stupid bubble-headed bimbo. It’s nobody’s fault the way we are...”

As the two sister kept closing themselves in the tight embrace, Wendy stopped listening and prepared herself.

There wasn’t any chance to have a better occasion than this to intervene. She had only to verify what was ready to be brought to the two elven fatties.

As she checked the kitchen, while preparing the tray and organizing the bowls she realized that…
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: When laughing isn’t funny…

choices: A full fledged feast! Just as the afternoon banquet had never been done!
A small light snack…there was still dinner in the mess hall to go to
A series of dedicated plates for the two of them, in LARGE quantities
A couple of hoses. Ready for the shake girls?
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As the fairy entered the room, she barely managed to restrain herself as she saw the two blubbery elves hugging each other, smothering the other in their own rolls of fat. Wendy managed to restrain herself from straight jumping into them to feel their squishiness, and instead slowly approached them giving to each of them, their own trays with snack.

“Here you go, ladies. As I was cleaning, I realized that after all this time after lunch you might be getting hungry so I prepared a little something…”

Both, Kai and Fai, accepted the trays even if for different reasons. Kai was indeed growing a bit hungrier, while Fai didn’t know how to politely refuse. Soon enough tough, both elven girls were digging into their respective trays, it had been enough to nibble a bit on the brownies and both felt as if they were hooked to it.

Kai was downing them two at a time, messily covering her face in chocolate and crumbs, Fai instead was trying to appear more polite and gentle, and yet she consumed them at a rapid pace. As the two elven fatties gorged on the food, Wendy made sure to go back into the small kitchen to check how the rest was coming along, but only to return in the main room with two large milkshakes which were left ear the tow fatties for them to enjoy.

“Don’t worry girls…I’ve got something more coming, Just a few minutes and more is coming…”

As she said that the elven girls had both different reactions. Kai, as she swallowed the last pieces of brownies, simply massaged her gut a bit in anticipation, before going for the milkshake left near her.

“More? Good Job Wendy! This was barely an appetizer…”

Fai instead, seemed to come out of her trance, with some crumbs from the brownie she was eating, still on her lips.

“M-More!? B-But…I…I mean…I woulnd’t want to…I-Impose..”

The fairy simply smiled as she returned into the kitchen.

“None taken. Now sit back and enjoy, we will celebrate our first sleepover and, also, your reunion! Double Celebration Party Incoming!”

For the rest of the afternoon and for a long part of the evening, Wendy continued to bring out more cakes and sweets, always leaving them nearby the two bloating elven girls, letting them free to indulge in them. Kai didn’t had any problem with that and she quickly filled her plates up to the brim, stuffing herself full of food in the process. Her belly, already quite big and wide, began to bloat out more and more until it ripped the shirt she was wearing. The bubbly elf didn’t seem to be fazed by this as she simply kept eating, muttering something about ‘finally being free’.

Faihera, meanwhile was slowly falling prey to the delicious taste of whatever concoction Wendy seemed able to produce. If she was making a fuss about eating at first, she soon let down all her worries and simply let herself being taken by her gluttonous side. Soon enough in fact, as she quite messily had began scarfin down her maw a large cake, using only her bare hands, she began to feel constricted. Without her notice, in fact her clothes were getting tighter and tighter. Until her gown gave up the fight and popped the button that was keeping it closed up to that moment. For a moment she seemed to awaken herself from her daze but, before she could do anything Wendy appeared out of nowhere, leaving on her thighs a huge burger cake thingy.

“Wha…*urp*…what is this?”

“That’s, Fai, is my very own Burger cake! It’s basically an hamburger made with the size of a cake in mind. Hope you like it…I’ve got a few more to bring out.”

Fai, before she could say anything, felt herself attract immensely by the huge treat. For an instant she looked at her sister and realized that she wans’t going to receive any help from her, as Kai was already munching hr way through half of her own burger-cake.

Unable to stop herself, Fai, soon found herself taking a bite of out of the humongous dish and began smiling in ecstasy.

IT was almost dinner time and the two elven girls laid on their own seats completely wrecked.

Kai, was breathing hard, her huge belly jutting out monstrously as she tried to not explode right there. She felt stuffed to her limit, and yet, although she had eaten way more than her fair share, she still could smell the delicious aroma’s coming from the kitchen. And something told her that, no matter how full she could always go for something more. Fai was in a similar heap on her own seat.

She had glutted away all afternoon, eating way more than she usually did and was now feeling exceedingly full and bloated. Yet, he couldn’t say it had been a bad thing. Everything the little fairy had prepared had been delicious and she realized that she was going to miss her cooking as soon as she was back in her own dorm.

Due to this thought, as she pushed herself upright, she saw no harm in indulging a little more before gog back to her own room.

“E-Ehi…Kai...?”

“Y…*Urp*…Yeah?”

“I was…wondering if…you were ready…for round 2?”

Kai smiled in hearing those words, slowly she craned her neck and saw Fai smiling to her. It was a good thing that they had made peace for that afternoon together was a bonding experience unlike any other she had ever had with her own sister.

“S-Sure…W…Wendy?”

The fairy, which had her own fill as the two fatties stuffed themselves full, appeared at the doorway of the kitchen. “Yes, Kai?”

“Do you…have anything…else? We’re…*uff* we’re ready for round 2…”

Wendy, once more had to cross her legs to restrain from coming right there. The two of them had eaten all afternoon, and now they were ready to eat even more? It was a feeder dream coming true!

“S-Sure, Kai! A couple more snack coming your way in a few!”

As the two bloated elves waited, they both soothingly caressed their bloated bellies and body, until they hear Wendy coming toward them and bringing…
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A peace offering with Brownies and Shakes

Which of these will be the main focus?

Will Fai lose the tone in her body from magic or overeating? Or maybe there’s a little more to it than just putting on weight? If she’s lazy enough she might also lose interest in table manners and hygiene.

Faihera could expand her body outwards with air or juice if you’d like. There’s lots of possibility’s there.

112.content:
How about we follow the young dictator in training Alex?

Or maybe someone completely different?
112.title: Manly Men

choices: Go find his dorm room. (Maybe meet his new Roomie?)
See what classes he has. (Education is most important you know.)
Madam Elendrum wants a word. (This can't be good...)
1121.content:
Alex sat on his seat, staring out into the window as the scenery passed him by like the wind going through his hair. Out of everyone here, He felt like he was the only one aware of what was truly going on here.

His fellow peers, which consisted of species from almost every place, were happily chatting among themselves, either speaking with their friends or making new ones as he sat alone, enjoying his last few seconds of freedom. This..."School" was considered one of the highest achieving places among the entire world. Every student, bad, or good, came out with solid grades and a can do attitude that seemed a little...off, but nobody questioned it. It was considered an honor to be hand picked to join them in excellence. but honestly, that was bullshit to Alex.

He knew what they did. And he didn't like it.

As the bus stopped at it's drop off point, students began filing out of the bus, enjoying the fresh air and finally glad to stretch their limbs from the long bus ride. Alex stood among them, his face hidden away within a hoodie. They stood in front of the school gates, which honestly felt like a prison had a three way with a school and a haunted castle, producing this monstrosity. The place was huge no doubt, but the amount of security is what really caught Alex's eye. There was a camera in every corner you looked, and a fence with barbered wire on it covered the school perimeter. The fence seemed to be also electrocuted, but he didn't want to test if it was truly.

"Hello and welcome future meals- I mean students, to Demonatrium High! Were your needs come first!" Standing beside the school gate greeting them was a red skinned Demoness. She wore a black buttoned up shirt that struggled to contain her fleshy orbs, while her skirt barely covered most of her thighs. Alex's conclusion? Cougar, or too lazy to buy bigger clothes. Most of the guys, and some of the girls stared at her in lust.

"I hope you all are excited to explore your new home until your graduation! Because I certainly am!" She seemed a little too peppy for Alex's taste.

"Allow me to formally introduce myself. I am Madam Elendrum, but you may call me Elen! I will be your headmistress on your journey to education! So please feel free to ask me anything if you have any questions, okay? Now off you go now!" Every student went their separate ways, either with friends or by themselves, going to the place they found most interesting.

What will Alex decide to do?
1121.title: [Insert Edgy Title Here]

11211.content:
"Room 666...how fitting." Alex gazed at the door to his dorm room. He knew he was gonna have to spend the rest of the school year with his new roommate, but he didn't know exactly what to expect. Would his Roomie be mean and force Alex to his side of the room? Or would he be super annoying and not know the boundaries that Alex required? There was no way to know until he opened the door.

"Well, here goes everything..." With a small creak, he opened the door wide enough for him to stick his head through, the smell of cake filled his nostrils almost immediately.

Across from the empty bed that he presumed was his, a large, heavy looking red Dragoness was stuffing her mouth with a piece of lava cake, moaning and rubbing her bloated tummy with each bite she took. Alex wanted to desperately look away, but he couldn't help but find the sight before him alluring. The "Chubby" Dragoness wore a pair of tiny shorts that struggled to hold her ever growing hips. Her black shirt, which Alex recognized as an Avenged Sevenfold T-shirt, struggled to contain her belly as the band's name was stretched against her fun bags. Every part of her clothing threatened to tear apart against her growing mass as her body jiggled from her constant belly shakes.

Alex should probably say something...or maybe give her some time alone. She seems a little content with herself right now, and He didn't want to break that.
11211.title: The "Chubby" Dragoness

info.brief_description: This school is not what it seems. Will you manage to get out of it as you entered or not ?
info.description:
“Welcome to the Demonatrium School for the Talented Non-Humans!
We will be overjoyed in instructing you for whole semesters at times in order to obtain your sou…Er, I mean, in order to obtain your confidence in our study methods and to prepare you for your final destiny!
Please, do come in, don’t worry about the red-skinned, winged and horned, teachers. They are simply the best that the Underworld can offer for your education. “


Ok, here we go, in this interactive you’ll find a typical High School setting but in a different kind of world. The world you’ll find is one in which Humans and Non-Humans coexist, almost, peacefully. Sure, sometimes some cheerleaders could end seduced and, consequently, drained of their blood by an hungry vampire, or some innocent bystander could soon find a new home in the stomach of one of the many predators that roam the place, but it’s peace, nonetheless.

Sorta.

Kind of.

You got the idea.


In our case, you should be following someone, male or female, young or old, as it prepare him/herself for a life in the world wide famous “High school for Talented Non-Humans” but someone change the cards on the table, for there are many forces who could gain lots of power by enslaving the new generation of Non-Humans, sending them instead to the Underworld Demonatrium High School for who knows what purpose...

The choice will only be yours….



Now, some rules:

I know it will be an unpopular decision, but it will be required, to avoid deletion and/or correction, to follow the below listed bullets:

- Decent grammar and decent sized chapters. Chapters composing of only two or three lines will not be accepted, except for special cases as the need to list for multiple choices or for Respawn choices (Example: The main character is a prey and will be devoured), if in doubt send me a note and we will see.

- Do not end the story. Keep it going or simply let a Respawn point be there and start( or continue) another one, if you don’t want to proceed with the same.

- No Scat, Poop and any other related fetish involving dirty activities with urine and feces and /or similar, unless is in a VERY mild manner . A general Slobbines can be accepted but, again, only in a generalized way. Sorry, I’m a devious man with many fetishes but, even I’ve got my limits.

- There will be, almost, no limit in growth/gain/stomach capacity/… as far as I’m concerned but, please, put some effort into it. Don’t let the main character ( or whoever else) gain hundreds of thousand pounds of weight/muscle/ height/... in just one sentence. I’m the first that prefer quantity over quality, but even I describe the action, a little bit at least.

- Try to stay in character or use a justification at least ( example: A bimbo will never fight a monster unless she’s been cursed /hexed to act against her nature). There can be an endless supply of characters, choose the one that better adapts to your ideas or create it if there isn’t.

- Leave always a choice, it is an interactive after all. Do not force the reader to follow your path, give always a way to change or twist the story.

- This is a fantasy setting, the laws of reality don't apply here. There can be magic, weird ray guns, all kind of fetishes ( as blueberry, shrinking, vore, ...) and whatever comes to your mind (as long as it doesn't break the previous rules), just put some effort into it, please.

- Sex is allowed, just try not to be too graphic about it or to focus too much on it. No gender limitations either, just give a warning if things are going to be Hot in the chapter ;)

-If you want to create your own character in this settng, be my guest, just follow the rules and don't change the main setting/focus of the story.

- I ask you the favour to not update the first choices of each chapter (storyline 1-1-1-1-1) so that I can keep on updating the "Real Story" as I have first envisioned, thank you :)

Last but not the least, have fun, enjoy and I’ll try to keep my Dictatorial Ways leashed. ;)

Enjoy!
